short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bitboni Rewards enables you to earn crypto rewards and saves you money with automatic discount codes when you shop online.

This extension also saves you time and money by testing all available discount codes, when you reach the checkout page of a partner website, and automatically applying the one that saves you the most money. This way you can save money â€“ and earn crypto!

Just shop online as you normally would.  When you reach the website of one of our Affiliate Marketing partners, youâ€™ll be asked to activate Bitboni Rewards with one click. We use that commission to purchase your selected crypto and add it to your wallet!

ðŸ¤‘ YOUR PRIVACY IS IMPORTANT ðŸ¤‘

The Bitboni Rewards extension does not collect any of your personal information or payment details. It does not view your emails or record your searches. Also, we never sell your data to advertisers or other third parties.

By using this extension, you will be earning the crypto currency. The money we earn from this system goes directly towards purchasing the crypto currency of your choice for you (see them ïƒ  https://rewards.bitboni.com/crypto). We retain part of the revenue to build and maintain our free tools.

If you create a Bitboni Rewards account, and sign into your account through the extension, your activity will be recorded to your account, and you will receive email notifications of you impact.
